news_title: Ethereum Blob Limit Rises to 21 Units in Latest Network Upgrade
news_subtitle: Ethereum News Ethereum developers completed the second Blob Parameter-Only hard fork on Wednesday, raising the blob limit from 15 to 21 units. The upgrade allows more transactions to be batched via rollups, reducing costs for layer-2 users. The hard fork took effect at 1:01:11 a....
